H0.text: who is richard pryor son. Richard Pryor Jr.

H1.text: who is richard pryor son. Mason Pryor

H2.text: who is richard pryor son. Franklin Pryor

H3.text: who is richard pryor son. Rain Pryor

A4.text: Richard Pryor Jr., born April 10, 1962; from Pryor's first wife Patricia Price.

A5.text: Rain Pryor, born July 16, 1969; from Pryor's second wife Shelley Bonus.

A6.text: Rain Pryor (born July 16, 1968) is an American actress. Her television credits include sitcoms Head of the Class and Rude Awakening. She is the daughter of comedian Richard Pryor.
